description: This file defines a centralized routing class for a Flutter application, managing named routes and route generation logic, especially handling the '/detail' route with arguments of type RecipeDetailArgs.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A static class managing route definitions and navigation logic, including route names, route map, and route generation with argument validation.

classes.name: RecipeDetailArgs
classes.description: A data class encapsulating arguments for the recipe detail route, allowing optional specification of a recipe ID or a Recipe object, with the recipe taking precedence if both are provided.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of route names to widget builders for core screens, used by MaterialApp.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Handles route creation for named routes needing arguments, specifically the '/detail' route which expects a RecipeDetailArgs instance.
